attributes.action: Remove the use of HGVs from British Roads between the hours of 0700 and 1800 daily
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: restrict HGVs to transport and delivery from 1800 to 0700 daily, no access to cities, towns etc. outside these hours, better management of vehicular movement would create less congestion,less pollution and therefore reduce the carbon footprint.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
